entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Flurries beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then clearing. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
